title: This assignment tests you on how to use if else statements when you want to make decisions in the program.

questionText.text:
We have a loud talking parrot. The "hour" parameter is the current hour time in the range 0..23. We are in trouble if the parrot is talking and the hour is before 7 or after 20. Return true if we are in trouble.
parrotTrouble(true, 6) → true
parrotTrouble(true, 7) → false
parrotTrouble(false, 6) → false
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
